text: André Antoine Bernard (21 June 1751 – 19 October 1818) called Bernard de Saintes, was a French lawyer and revolutionary, one of the Jacobins responsible for the Reign of Terror in the French Revolution. Category:1751 births Category:1818 deaths Category:French lawyers Category:Presidents of the National Convention Category:Politicians from Nouvelle-Aquitaine Category:People from Charente-Maritime
title: André Antoine Bernard
